pages.faq: AquaFlow - Pure Water Delivery in India | FAQ Home Reviews FAQ FAQ What is the source of your water? Our water is sourced from deep underground aquifers, ensuring it is free from surface contaminants and impurities. How is your water purified? We use a multi-stage purification process that includes reverse osmosis, UV disinfection, and other advanced techniques to ensure the highest levels of purity and safety. Is your water enriched with minerals? Yes, our water is fortified with essential minerals like calcium and magnesium to enhance its nutritional value and provide a balanced hydration experience. How often do you test your water quality? We adhere to stringent quality standards and regularly test our water at various stages of the purification process to ensure it meets the highest safety and purity levels. How do you ensure the freshness of your water? We deliver water directly from our state-of-the-art facilities, ensuring maximum freshness and great taste. Additionally, our delivery vehicles are equipped with refrigeration units to maintain the ideal temperature. What areas do you service? We currently provide water delivery services across major cities in India. You can check the specific areas we cover on our website or by contacting our customer support team. How often can I expect water deliveries? The delivery frequency depends on the plan you choose. Our plans range from bi-weekly to daily deliveries, ensuring you always have a steady supply of fresh water. Can I customize my delivery schedule? Absolutely! We understand that every customer has unique needs. Our team will work with you to create a delivery schedule that best suits your requirements. How do I place an order? You can easily place an order through our website by selecting the plan that best fits your needs. Alternatively, you can reach out to our customer support team for assistance. What payment methods do you accept? We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, net banking, mobile wallets, and cash on delivery (in select areas). Do you offer any discounts or promotions? Yes, we regularly offer discounts and promotional offers for our valued customers. Be sure to check our website or follow our social media channels for the latest deals. How can I track my order? Once your order is placed, you will receive a unique tracking number that allows you to monitor the status of your delivery through our website or customer support channels. What is your return or cancellation policy? We stand behind the quality of our water and services. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return or cancel your order within the specified time frame outlined in our policy. Do you offer water coolers or dispensers? Yes, we provide a range of water coolers and dispensers for purchase or rental, ensuring you have a convenient way to enjoy our purified water at home or in the office. How can I contact your customer support team? You can reach out to our friendly customer support team through various channels, including phone, email, or our website's live chat feature. We're always happy to assist you. What makes AquaFlow unique? At AquaFlow, we prioritize quality, convenience, and sustainability. Our rigorous purification process, efficient delivery system, and eco-friendly approach set us apart, ensuring you receive the best possible water delivery experience. Embrace a Healthier, Sustainable Way of Life with AquaFlow At AquaFlow, we believe that access to clean, safe, and great-tasting water is a fundamental right for everyone. That's why we've made it our mission to provide a convenient and eco-friendly solution for households and businesses across India. Our journey began with a simple idea – to eliminate the hassle of carrying heavy water bottles and reduce the environmental impact of plastic waste. By delivering purified water directly to your doorstep, we've revolutionized the way people hydrate themselves, making it easier than ever to stay refreshed and healthy. What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to quality and sustainability. We source our water from deep, pristine aquifers, ensuring it is free from surface contaminants and impurities. Our state-of-the-art purification process, which includes advanced techniques like reverse osmosis and UV disinfection, guarantees that every drop of water you receive is safe, pure, and enriched with essential minerals. But our dedication goes beyond just providing top-quality water. We understand the importance of convenience, which is why we offer flexible delivery schedules tailored to your needs. Whether you require bi-weekly, weekly, or even daily deliveries, our efficient logistics system ensures that you never run out of fresh water supplies. Moreover, we take pride in our eco-friendly approach. By reducing the reliance on single-use plastic bottles, we're playing our part in minimizing environmental impact and promoting a more sustainable future. Every time you choose AquaFlow, you're not only investing in your health but also contributing to a greener tomorrow. At the heart of our company is a passionate team dedicated to exceptional customer service. We value your satisfaction above all else, and our friendly support staff is always ready to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Join the AquaFlow family today and experience the convenience, quality, and peace of mind that comes with having pure, refreshing water delivered right to your doorstep. Together, we can embrace a healthier, more sustainable way of life, one sip at a time. Purifying lives, one drop at a time. pages.privacy: AquaFlow - Pure Water Delivery in India | Privacy Policy Home Reviews FAQ AquaFlow Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how AquaFlow ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website (the "Website"). Information We Collect We collect several types of information from and about users of our Website: Personal Information: This includes information that can be used to identify you, such as your name, billing address, delivery address, phone number, and email address. Order Information: This includes information about your water delivery orders, such as the type and quantity of water ordered, delivery frequency, and payment information. Usage Data: This includes information about how you use our Website, such as the pages you visit, the time you spend on those pages, and the links you click. How We Collect Information We collect information from you in a variety of ways, including: When you create an account or place an order on our Website. When you contact us through our website or customer service channels. When you use our Website, we may automatically collect information about your device and browsing activity using cookies and other tracking technologies. How We Use Your Information We use your information to: Provide and fulfill your water delivery orders. Send you important information about your orders, including order confirmations, delivery updates, and promotional offers. Respond to your inquiries and customer service requests. Improve our Website and services. Send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers (with your consent). Sharing Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate our business and provide our services. These service providers are contractually obligated to keep your information confidential and secure. We may also disclose your information if we are required to do so by law or if we believe it is necessary to protect the rights, property, or safety of ourselves or others. Your Choices You can choose to opt out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those communications. You can also access, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our Website. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at aquaflow@gmail.com Purifying lives, one drop at a time. Links Home Reviews FAQ Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Contacts 3rd cross, 2nd Main Rd, Vignan Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560075, India +91-88-0106-3999 aquaflow@gmail.com

pages.terms: AquaFlow - Pure Water Delivery in India | Terms and Conditions Home Reviews FAQ AquaFlow Terms and Conditions Welcome to AquaFlow! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the AquaFlow website (the "Website") and the services offered by AquaFlow ("Services"). By accessing or using the Website or Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. 1. Use of the Website and Services You must be at least 18 years old to use the Website and Services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You agree to use the Website and Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Website or Services in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Website or Services. 2. Orders and Payment You agree to pay for all water delivery orders placed by you. Prices for water delivery orders are subject to change without notice. We accept various payment methods, which may be subject to additional terms and conditions. 3. Delivery We will deliver your water order to the address you specify. Delivery times may vary depending on your location. You are responsible for ensuring that someone is available to receive your water delivery. 4. Disclaimer of Warranties THE WEBSITE AND SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. AQUAFLOW DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. 5. Termination We may terminate your access to the Website and Services for any reason, at any time, without notice. 7. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. 8. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and AquaFlow with respect to your use of the Website and Services. 9. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at aquaflow@gmail.com Purifying lives, one drop at a time.
